detectors.description:

detectors.markdown:
[MyAdvancedToken.frozenAccount](samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_032.sol#L120) is never initialized. It is used in:

detectors.description:
MyAdvancedToken.migrate_and_destroy() (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_032.sol#152-155) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(this.balance == totalSupply) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_032.sol#153)

owned.transferOwnership(address) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_032.sol#15-17) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_032.sol#16)

owned.transferOwnership(address).newOwner (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_032.sol#15) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = newOwner (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_032.sol#16)
TokenERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_032.sol#56-72) is never used and should be removed
detectors.markdown: [TokenERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256)](samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_032.sol#L56-L72) is never used and should be removed

detectors.description:
Deprecated standard detected suicide(address)(owner) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_032.sol#154):
	- Usage of "suicide()" should be replaced with "selfdestruct()"

detectors.description:

	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder
	- ZeroFunctionSelector.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.16 (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_032.sol#1)
